name: Forgotten City
description:
Forgotten City is an interactive art piece set in the ruins of a lost world. You'll be able to explore some of its remains, and get lost in the endless fog of this mysterious place.

This project wasn't made for the purpose of being a video game. It's a digital interactive piece of art. Therefore, gameplay and storytelling were put aside for this project. The world the spectator sets foot in is based on a world I developed through an illustrated work called Megalostructure. A series of pictures depicting the layered world with its different locations Forgotten City is set in. The objective of this interactive piece of art was to get the feeling of jumping into those images, and get lost inside them.

Controls

Arrow Keys = Move Around
Mouse = Look Around
F = Flashlight On/Off

If you are interested in Megalostructure, here's a link to see more of this world:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/4XeeZ4

Main 3D modeling, texturing, and programming were made by myself.
A few 3D models, as well as all the soundscape are free to use elements found on the internet.

Forgotten City was made in Unreal Engine.
